name: The Rain
description:
In this world, there is only one scene, one platform, and only one of you. The weather seems a bit filled with death at the moment, so how long can you last under these conditions?

Controls:

  • Arrow-keys to move.
  • Space on the ground to jump.
  • Space in the air (while holding a horizontal direction) to teleport.
  • If stuck, press "R" to reset.
